Class CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flossware.jcore.utils.collections.CollectionUtils

  • public class CollectionUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for collections.
    Author:
    sfloess

    • Method Detail

      • ensureCollection

        public static <C extends Collection<?>> C ensureCollection(C collection,
                                                           int minSize,
                                                           String errorMsg)
                                                    throws IllegalArgumentException
        Ensures collection is not empty or null.
        Type Parameters:
        C - the collection to examine for a size.
        Parameters:
        collection - to check for null/empty.
        minSize - the minimum size of the collection.
        errorMsg - the message within the IllegalArgumentException if empty or null.
        Returns:
        collection if it is not null and of minimum size minSize.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if collection is empty or null.

      • ensureCollection

        public static <C extends Collection<?>> C ensureCollection(C collection,
                                                           String errorMsg)
                                                    throws IllegalArgumentException
        Ensures list is not empty or null.
        Type Parameters:
        C - the collection to examine for a size.
        Parameters:
        collection - to check for null/empty.
        errorMsg - the message within the IllegalArgumentException if empty or null.
        Returns:
        collection if it is not null and contains DEFAULT_MIN_LIST_SIZE elements.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if collection is empty or null.

      • addValue

        public static <V> Collection<V> addValue(Collection<V> collection,
                                         V value,
                                         boolean isToAdd)
        Only add a value if isToAdd is true.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type contained in collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection to be added to.
        value - the value to add to collection.
        isToAdd - if true, value will be added to collection, false it will not be added.
        Returns:
        the collection added to.

      • sort

        public static <V> Collection<V> sort(Collection<V> toSort,
                                     Comparator<V> comparator)
        Take a collection and sort it, returning a new collection of the sort.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type to sort.
        Parameters:
        toSort - the collection to sort - will not be affected.
        comparator - will perform comparisons for sort order.
        Returns:
        a newly sorted collection.

      • filter

        public static <T,V> Collection<T> filter(Collection<T> collection,
                                         Filter<T,V> filter,
                                         V value)
        Filter a collection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to filter upon.
        V - the value to find.
        Parameters:
        collection - is the collection to filter.
        filter - is the filter to apply.
        value - the value to search for.
        Returns:
        a collection of those items in the collection that satisfy the filter.
